title: Is It Just Me or Is League doing Patch 6.15 RIght Now? Someone help T^T
body: I was in game and I froze in game so I exit game but I'm not so sure

replies.body:
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} OMG ITS BACKIA S(YGHFILUO:SG T(*OIUEWBTHNJUSG F
THE SERVER IS BACK

Glad to hear everything is okay now!  We had a patch roll out, and we try to prepare players for any potential issues on our[ server status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Best of luck in your games!
